pages.text: The Arcane Enchantment reduces the mana cost of weapons by $(#2895CB)10%$() for each level of the enchant (Ex: Arcane II = 20%). This cannot be applied to special items like the Channeler and $(l:archon:necromancy/undead_staff)Staff of Undead$(). Arcane be obtained from a $(l:archon:world/wizard)Wizard$(), Librarian Villager, or from an enchantment table.
